column5: It's been a bit since I have posted I have been very busy I still check in but have not been out fishing much so the fish reports are slow.  I do want to post this as many of you know me you know my family means the most to me. Our business also revolves around family friends and giving back. Well this year I had the bright idea to bring our logo to life. After doing a lot of research online I had convinced myself that we needed a Mascott  it was easy to convince Danna she loved the idea and the kids well that was a no brainer as my daughter loves to act and already has lots of time as other Mascotts. I found many companies in the USA but wanted to stay in Canada I found a small company out of Toronto that started with two friends no they have 24 employees and do them for people all over the world they are Maydewell Mascott if you want to look them up.  Anyway here is the first look of BARZ who will be at musky Sunday February 14th at the Toronto Spring Fishing Show.
The name suits the look! Congrats and best of luck! HH
Definitely has the Muskie look. Maybe too green. Is this the final product?
Cool..can we get one to close the tailgate with its head hanging out  And, thank you for staying in Canada

Lol thanks guys we can't wait to get out to the shows with it. Yes this is the final product of you ever see the green musky they are cool. We had originally wanted to do a LSC spotted one but our colour logo was to nice to switch up.
Very Cool looking Tight Lines SBK
Looking good! And yes the green is a good call I think as well
I like it! Real cool mike!
Looks great!  Go on you for supporting another Canadian company.
